com.escape.games.service
Class TimerService

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.escape.games.core.GameTask
          com.escape.games.core.GameTaskWithChannel
              com.escape.games.service.TimerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Timer, TaskChannel, java.lang.Runnable
public class TimerService
extends GameTaskWithChannel
implements Timer

Core implementation of the timer service. This service is free-threaded. There is one locked object, timers. Responds to Game Control messages to pause and resume timers. Timers do not start until the first GAME_START is received.

Author:
escape-llc

register

public void register(TimerCallback cb)
Description copied from interface: Timer
Register the timer. Calls TimerCallback.setConfig() to initialize settings. It will receive its first callback on the next TBT with elapsed==0.

Specified by:
register in interface Timer
Parameters:
cb - the timer to register.

unregister

public void unregister(TimerCallback cb)
Description copied from interface: Timer
Remove the indicated timer. It does not receive any additional callbacks.

Specified by:

Parameters:
